name: Social Space
description:
Social Space is a game about social media in space, and how the vast distances between even the planets in our solar system will introduce delays in our messages (and our relationships).

You interact by sending tweets, on the compose panel. You logout to advance the time. Sending tweets to different people (or not sending them) changes the story. Mousewheel scrolls.

Built for the 2015 Indie Galactic Space Jam

Programming, Story, and Art by Murph

@DorkNightShow
